channel.title: Sand In The Vaseline on Talking Heads Chords
channel.description: Recent content in Sand In The Vaseline on Talking Heads Chords

item.title: I Want To Live
item.description: Am F G I want to live, to feel a face Am that isn’t there Am F I want to live G Am I roll over and you’re not there E F I’m only standing on the shore E F G |:F |C |G :| I had some friends but I want more mmmmm F C Am G I see the future and it’s all mine F C Am G Want to be perfect, I’m taking my time F C I’ll try not to act like I’m so far away F C I try to be right in whatever I say F C Deeper feelings recur again & again & again & again F C A complex spiral leads me to spin…

item.title: Gangster Of Love
item.description: |:Em | |Am | :| Am Em Gangster of love Am Gangster of love Em You with the cocktail in your hand Am You in your red Mercedes Benz Em Goin’ in one ear and out the other Am cover up the pain with laughter, baby Em I’m not laughing Am I’m not laughing G Hey Al Capone F Is that who you think you are? Em All the girls

item.title: Lifetime Piling Up
item.description: |:Am | G:| I have tried marijuana I get nervous any time There will come a knockin’ at the door Why is everybody makin’ eyes at me ? I don’t want to know Excuse and pardon me Stay for a while Maybe we’ll never meet again Am G I can see my lifetime piling up Am G I can see the days turn into nights Am G I can see the people on the street Am

item.title: Popsicle
item.description: |:Dm ©:| I’m hanging round the airport I’m waiting for the plane Mmmmm - something sweet and sticky Runnin’down my hand F G Am Popsicle of love Dm Gimme gimme gimme one of those (It’s summertime, boy!) F G Am coconut delight Dm Honey honey honey don’t let go (It’s summertime, love) |:Dm ©:| Mmm - a kinky little sister Mmm - a-wearin’ rubber gloves A sexual emergency A corporation fantasy You and me, ecstasy A pay T.
